0: People in Iran have demonstrated against the government in the biggest wave of protests to hit the country in almost a decade. Here's what could be next for Iran and what the unrest means for more than 80 million Iranians. Video: Karan Deep Singh / Photo: Getty Images NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR WASHINGTON—The Trump administration is lobbying countries world-wide to support Iranians’ right to peaceful protest and is prepared to impose fresh sanctions if Iran’s government cracks down forcefully on the demonstrations spreading throughout the country, U.S. officials said.
